#labels Phase-Implementation
[http://ofeli.googlecode.com/svn/doc/index.html Developer's documentation]

=Structure=

In this project, the Graphical User Interface (GUI) is clearly separated of the image processing part.

GUI part :

file imageviewer.cpp file with the class ofeli::ImageViewer (dependant of the Qt4 framework)
file pixmapwidget.cpp with the class ofeli::PixmapWidget (dependant of the Qt4 framework)
Image processing part :

activecontour.cpp file with the class ofeli::ActiveContour (dependant of the STL library)
file ac_withoutedges.cpp with the class ofeli::ACwithoutEdges (dependant of the STL library)
file ac_withoutedges_yuv.cpp with the class ofeli::ACwithoutEdgesYUV (dependant of the STL library)
file geodesic_ac.cpp with the class ofeli::GeodesicAC (dependant of the STL library)
file hausdorff_distance.cpp with the class ofeli::HausdorffDistance
file filters.cpp with the class ofeli::Filters (dependant of the Boost library)
file filters_rgb.cpp with class ofeli::FiltersRGB (dependant of the Boost library)
